title: IBM Storage Ceph as a Service docs
introduction: IBM Storage Ceph as a Service is a high performing, flexible and predictable unified storage (block and object) on-premises which is IBM managed with cloud-like provisioning capabilities and on-demand capacity. Leverage the docs, API & SDK reference, architecture references, and more to support your app development needs.

section_recommended.title: Getting started with IBM CephaaS
section_recommended.description: Get up and running quickly by completing this short tutorial to set up a IBM CephaaS service.

section_recommended.title: IBM CephaaS CLI
section_recommended.description: The IBM CephaaS plug-in extends the IBM Cloud command line interface (CLI) with an API wrapper for working with unified storage resources.
